title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Censorship of Films and Censorship
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Censorship of Films and Censorship 
of Publications (Transfer of Departmental Administration and Ministerial 
Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 August 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited censorship film censorship publication (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order come operation 1 august 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Culture, Communications and Sport. 

(2) References to the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration 
contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, on and after the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Department of 
Culture, Communications and Sport.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department culture communication sport (2) reference department justice home affair migration contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department culture communication sport

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and

(b)

(c) 

the Video Recordings Act 1989 (No.22 of 1989), 

are transferred to the Minister for Culture, Communications and Sport. 

(2) References to the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration 
contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
functions transferred by this Article shall, on and after the commencement of 
this Order, be construed as references 
the Minister for Culture,

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and 
Migration is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions transferred 
by this Order to the Minister for Culture, Communications and Sport, the name 
of the Minister for Culture, Communications and Sport shall, in so far as the 
proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be substituted in the 
proceedings for that of the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration or 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [393] 3 

added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not 
abate by reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister justice home affair migration party proceeding reference function transferred order minister culture communication sport name minister culture communication sport shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister justice home affair migration notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th july 2025 393 3 added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration may, 
in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for 
Culture, Communications and Sport, be carried on or completed on or after such 
commencement by the Minister for Culture, Communications and Sport.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister justice home affair migration may far relates function transferred order minister culture communication sport carried completed commencement minister culture communication sport

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect on and 
after such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Culture, Communications and Sport.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister culture communication sport

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration 
contained in the constitution of any company and relating to any function 
transferred by this Order shall, on and after the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Minister for Culture, Communications and Sport.
text_norm: 7 reference minister justice home affair migration contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister culture communication sport

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and 
Migration in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred to the Minister for Culture, Communications and Sport and, 
accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such 
commencement – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Culture, Communications and Sport, 

rights are 

rights of 
those 
Communications and Sport, and 

the Minister 

for Culture, 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Culture, 
Communications and Sport. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Culture, Communications and Sport by 
the 
commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Justice, Home Affairs and Migration shall, on the request of the Minister for 
Culture, Communications and Sport, be transferred into the name of the Minister 
for Culture, Communications and Sport.
